title: 如何使用番茄工作法提高效率
title_en: How to Use the Pomodoro Technique to Boost Productivity
excerpt: 番茄工作法是一种简单有效的时间管理方法，通过25分钟专注工作和5分钟休息的循环，帮助你保持高效和专注。本文将详细介绍如何实践这个方法。
excerpt_en: The Pomodoro Technique is a simple yet effective time management method. Through cycles of 25-minute focused work and 5-minute breaks, it helps you stay productive and focused. This article will guide you through practicing this method.

title: How to Use the Pomodoro Technique to Boost Productivity

excerpt: The Pomodoro Technique is a simple yet effective time management method. Through cycles of 25-minute focused work and 5-minute breaks, it helps you stay productively and focused. This article will guide you through practicing this method.
